description:
Are you tired of looking for keys? Wallets, Remote Controls? Finally, a truly simple & practical solution is available. Introducing our Find One Find All Key Finders. (FOFA for short) Unlike other key finders, no separate "Base" transmitter is needed - they are ALL transmitters! So, even if you can only FIND ONE, you can FIND them ALL! This Set of 2 Key Fob style FOFAs lets you put one on your keys and one on your partners, or a spare set of keys, or a handbag or cell phone - Use up to 6 in one Set. (and up to 6 Sets) Simple to setup and use, FOFA takes the stress out of life, no matter where you are. 

FOFA, for the person who has everything... and loses it!

FOFA has been produced and improved on for over 10 years by Melbourne Designs, LLC of Arlington TX, Accredited Member of the Better Business Bureau.

Patented. FCC B4SKXD-27 CE & IC 1632A-KXD27
title: 2-Way RF FOFA® Find One Find All® Key Finder, Wallet Finder, Cell Phone Finder, Remote Control Locator. Set of 2
